transport.description: 此商品1个工作日内买手店APP上进行确认，确认后2-5个工作日发货，发货后预计10个工作日左右能到目的地。如遇节假日及海关地检有可能会相应延长（APP会出相应公告）

description: Blue Wool Suits from Prada, jacket with button closure on front, three pockets on fromt, pinces on front, long sleeves buttons cuffs, two button pockets inside, brand logo inside label. Classic pants, hook and buttons closure, belt loops, two pockets on front, two button pockets on back, brand log inside label
